channel.title: Problem running apollo
channel.description:
I type "ant run" on apollo's dir and this comes up Buildfile: C:\Users\Miriam\Desktop\apollos\apollo\build.xml
init:
build:
run: [java] ene 03, 2012 1:05:54 AM org.apollo.Server <init> [java] Informaci¾n: Starting Apollo... [java] ene 03, 2012 1:05:54 AM org.apollo.ServiceManager init [java] Informaci¾n: Registering services... [java] ene 03, 2012 1:05:54 AM org.apollo.Server init [java] Informaci¾n: Initialized release #317. [java] ene 03, 2012 1:05:58 AM org.apollo.ServiceManager startAll [java] Informaci¾n: Starting services... [java] ene 03, 2012 1:05:58 AM org.apollo.game.model.World init [java] Informaci¾n: Loading item definitions... [java] ene 03, 2012 1:05:59 AM org.apollo.game.model.World init [java] Informaci¾n: Done (loaded 7956 item definitions). [java] ene 03, 2012 1:05:59 AM org.apollo.game.model.World init [java] Informaci¾n: Loading equipment definitions... [java] ene 03, 2012 1:05:59 AM org.apollo.game.model.World init [java] Informaci¾n: Done (loaded 1731 equipment definitions). [java] ene 03, 2012 1:05:59 AM org.apollo.Server bind [java] Informaci¾n: Binding service listener to address: 0.0.0.0/0.0.0.0:43 594... [java] ene 03, 2012 1:05:59 AM org.apollo.Server main [java] Grave: Error whilst starting server. [java] org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelException: Failed to bind to: 0.0.0.0 /0.0.0.0:43594 [java] at org.jboss.netty.bootstrap.ServerBootstrap.bind(ServerBootstra p.java:303) [java] at org.apollo.Server.bind(Unknown Source) [java] at org.apollo.Server.main(Unknown Source) [java] Caused by: java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind [java] at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind0(Native Method) [java] at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Net.java:344) [java] at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Net.java:336) [java] at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(ServerSocketChannelIm pl.java:199) [java] at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(ServerSocketAdaptor.java: 74) [java] at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioServerSocketPipelineSin k.bind(NioServerSocketPipelineSink.java:148) [java] at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioServerSocketPipelineSin k.handleServerSocket(NioServerSocketPipelineSink.java:100) [java] at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioServerSocketPipelineSin k.eventSunk(NioServerSocketPipelineSink.java:74) [java] at org.jboss.netty.channel.Channels.bind(Channels.java:468) [java] at org.jboss.netty.channel.AbstractChannel.bind(AbstractChannel. java:192) [java] at org.jboss.netty.bootstrap.ServerBootstrap$Binder.channelOpen( ServerBootstrap.java:348) [java] at org.jboss.netty.channel.Channels.fireChannelOpen(Channels.jav a:176) [java] at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioServerSocketChannel.<in it>(NioServerSocketChannel.java:85) [java] at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioServerSocketChannelFact ory.newChannel(NioServerSocketChannelFactory.java:142) [java] at org.jboss.netty.channel.socket.nio.NioServerSocketChannelFact ory.newChannel(NioServerSocketChannelFactory.java:90) [java] at org.jboss.netty.bootstrap.ServerBootstrap.bind(ServerBootstra p.java:282) [java] ... 2 more [java]
I downloaded this version http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,530547.0.html Edited by Zenocko to included 317 cache/batch files Why is this thing so complicated

item.title: Problem running apollo
item.dc:creator: @zubiri zubiri
item.description:
@zubiri wrote:

I type “ant run” on apollo’s dir and this comes up
Buildfile: C:\Users\Miriam\Desktop\apollos\apollo\build.xml
